title: Unstract Cloud Storage
description: Unstract Cloud Storage is a scalable and durable object storage service provided by Google Cloud Platform. This connector allows you to store and retrieve data on Unstract Cloud Storage.

bucket.title: Bucket Name
bucket.description: Name of the bucket to be restricted to.

endpointURL.title: Endpoint URL
endpointURL.description: Endpoint URL to connect to. (example https://storage.googleapis.com)
